evidence.claim: WLT Software utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health data.
WLT Software integrates EHR systems using middleware solutions.
They support electronic healthcare transactions using X12 standards.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Company focuses on HIPAA compliance and X12 transaction sets, indicating alignment with ICP characteristics.
